subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Speakers
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1218647312
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The 469 uses a very low powered amplifier circuit on the headphone  jack.  
Stand computer speakers will not really work for it and you will get  a very low 
audio out of it if anything.  What you need is a small set of  amplified 
speakers.  Radio Shack sells a few seats that fold up for around  $20.00.  I got 
mine when they were on sale for $10.00.  Or any good  amplified speakers will 
do the job for you.  But remember the clocking on  am.  The clicking will be 
amplified too so try and ignore it if  possible.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 8/13/2008 12:05:35 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
cawiggins78@... writes:

 
 
 
I hooked up these speakers and now I'm not getting a thing. I guess
I'm  using poor quality speakers. any suggestions on which speakers
work the  best with the 469?
